name: cc65-vice
description: An extension to debug CC65 running in VICE (Commodore) or Mesen (Nintendo) emulators.

scripts.clean: shx rm -r dist out obj || echo Done && make -C 3rdparty/cc65 clean && make -C src/__tests__/simple-project clean && make -C src/__tests__/asm-project clean
scripts.pip: pip3 install --user fonttools || pip install --user fonttools
scripts.c64ttf: npm-run-all pip && cd ./system/C64 && python3 ../../3rdparty/c64ttf/c64ttf.py -u chargen.sf-part1 -l chargen.sf-part2 -a -o ../../dist/c64.ttf || python ../../3rdparty/c64ttf/c64ttf.py -u chargen.sf-part1 -l chargen.sf-part2 -a -o ../../dist/c64.ttf
scripts.submodules: git submodule init && git submodule update --recursive || git submodule deinit --force --all
scripts.sevenzip: node -e "const shx = require('shelljs'); shx.config.fatal = true; const zip7 = shx.which('7zz') || shx.which('7z'); require('child_process').execFileSync(zip7.toString(), process.argv.slice(1), { stdio: 'inherit' }); "
scripts.compiler:base: npm-run-all compiler:distdir && shx rm -f cc65.zip && node -e "const shx = require('shelljs'); shx.config.fatal = true; const threads = require('os').cpus().length * 4; console.log('THREADS', threads); shx.exec('make -C 3rdparty/cc65 -j' + threads)" && make -C 3rdparty/cc65 zip && npm-run-all compiler:base:extract
scripts.compiler:on-win32: echo "WINDOWS CANNOT GENERATE FULL BUILDS!" && npm-run-all --aggregate-output -p compiler:base compiler:on-win32:*
scripts.compiler:on-darwin: echo "DARWIN CANNOT GENERATE FULL BUILDS!" && node -e "console.log('PROCESSOR', process.arch)" && npm-run-all --aggregate-output -p compiler:base compiler:on-darwin:*
scripts.compiler:choose: node -e "const shx = require('shelljs'); const [, quick] = process.argv; shx.config.fatal = true; shx.exec('npm-run-all compiler:' + (quick == '--quick' ? 'quick:' : '') + 'on-' + process.platform);" --
scripts.kernal: shx test -e dist/system || shx mkdir -p dist/system && shx cp -ru system/. dist/system
scripts.mintty:quick: node -e "process.exit(process.platform == 'win32' ? 0 : 1)" && npm-run-all mintty || echo "MinTTY not built"
scripts.mesen:monitor: shx test -e dist/mesen || shx mkdir -p dist/mesen && shx cp -ru 3rdparty/mesen-binary-monitor/. dist/mesen && shx cp -ru mesen-settings.xml dist/mesen/settings.xml
scripts.mesen:test: shx test -e src/__tests__/mesendir || shx mkdir -p src/__tests__/mesendir && curl -s -L "https://github.com/empathicqubit/Mesen-X/releases/download/trash/Mesen-Linux.2.zip" > src/__tests__/mesendir/mesen.zip && npm-run-all "sevenzip -- x -y src/__tests__/mesendir/mesen.zip -osrc/__tests__/mesendir"
scripts.applewin:configure:force: cd 3rdparty/applewin && shx mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake -DBUILD_SA2=ON ..
scripts.applewin:make: cd ./3rdparty/applewin/build && node -e "const shx = require('shelljs'); shx.config.fatal = true; const threads = require('os').cpus().length * 4; console.log('THREADS', threads); shx.exec('make -j' + threads)"
scripts.applewin:choose: env-cmd -x --silent -f ./build.env node -e "typeof process.env.APPLEWIN_DIRECTORY != 'undefined' ? process.exit(0) : process.exit(1)" && npm-run-all applewin:local || npm-run-all applewin:build
scripts.nonjs:quick: npm-run-all submodules && npm-run-all --aggregate-output -p styles fontgen kernal compiler:quick mintty:quick mesen:monitor
scripts.nonjs: npm-run-all submodules && npm-run-all --aggregate-output -p styles fontgen kernal compiler mintty mesen:monitor
scripts.build:full: npm-run-all --aggregate-output -p vice:choose tisk webpack && npm-run-all nonjs
scripts.build:test: npm-run-all --aggregate-output -p vice:choose applewin:choose mesen:test tisk webpack && npm-run-all nonjs:quick
scripts.vscode:install: npm-run-all package && codium --install-extension cc65-vice*.vsix || code --install-extension cc65-vice*.vsix
scripts.vice:make: cd ./src/__tests__/vicedir && node -e "const shx = require('shelljs'); shx.config.fatal = true; const threads = require('os').cpus().length * 4; console.log('THREADS', threads); shx.exec('make -j' + threads)"
scripts.vice:co: env-cmd -x --silent -f build.env sh -c 'svn checkout svn://svn.code.sf.net/p/vice-emu/code/${VICE_SVN_VERSION:-trunk}/vice ./src/__tests__/vicedir && svn info ./src/__tests__/vicedir' || svn cleanup ./src/__tests__/vicedir
scripts.vice:choose: env-cmd -x --silent -f ./build.env node -e "typeof process.env.VICE_DIRECTORY != 'undefined' ? process.exit(0) : process.exit(1)" && npm-run-all vice:local || npm-run-all vice:build
